:KitKat:

She looked over towards Phobia.  "I need to get back to my base and 
assist them.  They can fight, but I need to be with them.  Please 
hurry.  They need my help."

She walked closer to Phobia.  "I can also use those weapons you spoke 
of.  It may help even the odds  a bit for me and my team.  Can you 
get them for me?"

She hoped he would hand them over and get her to her base very soon. 
She was getting worried about Drillbit.  She wanted to make sure he 
was alright and unharmed.
